testimonials.text: Sushma has worked under me on Azure cloud migration project. She has shown explenary skills in Azure PAAS and Kubernetes. She also worked on Azure Devops setup for the client and deploying Java applications to Kubernetes and PAAS components. I wish I had her in my team. Will miss working with her. However i wish her all the best for her future endeavours.She has been one of very few people who has been in problem solving and implementing what she has learnt.
